description.english: Get eliminated for the first time.
description.schinese: 第一次死亡

description.english: Get eliminated 50 times.
description.schinese: 死亡50次

displayName.english: Only Death can Keep Us Apart
displayName.schinese: 只有死亡能将我们分离

description.english: Save a teammate.
description.schinese: 拯救一次队友

description.english: Succumb to poison.
description.schinese: 中毒而死

description.english: Defeat The Energized Slime.
description.schinese: 击败注能史莱姆

description.english: Defeat Neusara.
description.schinese: 击败寄生花

description.english: Defeat The Clockwork Lich.
description.schinese: 击败发条巫妖

description.english: Defeat The Witch of High Castle.
description.schinese: 击败高堡女巫

description.english: Get eliminated while being frozen.
description.schinese: 被怪物冰冻然后被杀死

description.english: Acquire all items from the shop.
description.schinese: 将商店里的所有物品都买下来

description.english: Have one common chip
description.schinese: 拿到一个普通芯片

description.english: Have one rare chip
description.schinese: 拿到一个稀有芯片

description.english: Have one epic chip
description.schinese: 拿到一个史诗芯片

description.english: Have more than 10 chips
description.schinese: 持有超过十个芯片

description.english: Have 20 chips at the same time.
description.schinese: 持有超过二十个芯片

description.english: Resurrect from spirit
description.schinese: 变成鬼魂之后复活

description.english: Go to the next stage as a spirit.
description.schinese: 在鬼魂状态下进入下一关

description.english: Collect more than 500 Gold in a single game.
description.schinese: 在一轮游戏中获得五百以上的硬币

description.english: Eliminate 10 monsters with items
description.schinese: 使用道具击杀十个怪物

description.english: Use items 10 times in a single room.
description.schinese: 在一个房间内使用道具超过十次

description.english: Level up every Wong's talent.
description.schinese: 升级旺的所有天赋

description.english: Level up every Brook's talent.
description.schinese: 升级布鲁克斯的所有天赋

description.english: Level up every Zoe's talent.
description.schinese: 升级佐伊的所有天赋

description.english: Level up every Howard's talent.
description.schinese: 升级霍华德的所有天赋

description.english: Level up every common talent.
description.schinese: 获得所有通用升级

description.english: Purchase a chip with Energy once.
description.schinese: 使用元能购买一次芯片

description.english: Purchase a chip with Energy ten times.
description.schinese: 使用元能购买十次芯片

description.english: Purchase chips from each device.
description.schinese: 在每种机器中购买过芯片

description.english: Collect every weapon in the game.
description.schinese: 获得过游戏中每一种武器

description.english: Collect every item in the game.
description.schinese: 获得过游戏中每一种道具

description.english: Collect every Bomb module in the game.
description.schinese: 获得过游戏中每一种炸弹模组

description.english: Get eliminated from your own Bomb.
description.schinese: 被自己的炸弹炸死过一次

description.english: Get eliminated from your teammate's Bomb.
description.schinese: 被队友的炸弹炸死过一次

description.english: Collect every chip in the game.
description.schinese: 获得过游戏中每一种芯片

description.english: Eliminate 30 monsters with Bombs.
description.schinese: 用炸弹击杀三十个怪物

description.english: Unlock every chip in the game.
description.schinese: 解锁游戏中所有的芯片

description.english: Pick up more than 50 Hearts of Life in a single game.
description.schinese: 在一局游戏中，拾取超过五十颗生命之心

description.english: Complete a stage with a teammate.
description.schinese: 和队友一起通关

description.english: Save teammate more than 10 times in a single game.
description.schinese: 在一局游戏中拯救队友超过十次

description.english: Accumulate 99 Energy
description.schinese: 积累九十九点元能

description.english: Complete a stage without losing HP.
description.schinese: 在没有损失一次生命值的情况下通关

description.english: Complete a stage without collecting any chips.
description.schinese: 不获得任何芯片的情况下通关

description.english: Acquire more than 30 items from crystals in a single game.
description.schinese: 在一轮游戏中使用炸弹破除水晶，在水晶中发现超过三十个物品

description.english: Get defeated in a boss room in a co-op game.
description.schinese: 合作游戏中在任意首领房间中输掉游戏

description.english: Kill more than 9,999 monsters
description.schinese: 累计杀死超过9999个怪物

description.english: Team up with a developer or players who have already granted this achievement.
description.schinese: 与开发人员或获得该成就的玩家联机游戏

description.english: Open 20 chests
description.schinese: 开启二十个宝箱

description.english: Plant more than 50 Bombs in a single game.
description.schinese: 一轮游戏中使用超过五十个炸弹

description.english: Get eliminated by the gamble machine's Bomb.
description.schinese: 被赌博机的炸弹炸死

description.english: Pick up 1,000 Gold
description.schinese: 拾取一千个硬币

description.english: Spend 300 Gold gambling in a single game.
description.schinese: 一局游戏中花费三百以上硬币进行赌博

description.english: Discover 10 hidden rooms.
description.schinese: 发现超过十个隐藏房间

description.english: Complete every Challenge room in a single game.
description.schinese: 完成一局游戏中的所有挑战房间

description.english: Explore 100 rooms on Polar Factory.
description.schinese: 在极地工厂中累计探索超过一百个房间

description.english: Explore 100 rooms on Solar Ruin.
description.schinese: 在索拉遗迹中累计探索超过一百个房间

description.english: Eliminate more than 25 monsters while affect being dizzy.
description.schinese: 在迷茫状态下累计击杀超过25只怪物

description.english: Lose more than 500 HP in a single game.
description.schinese: 一局游戏中消耗超过五百点生命值

description.english: Destroy more than 100 crystals with bombs
description.schinese: 使用炸弹累计爆破超过一百个水晶

description.english: Consume more than 500 Vitality in a single game.
description.schinese: 一局游戏中消耗超过五百点活力

description.english: Use more than 5 items in a single game.
description.schinese: 一局游戏中使用超过五种道具

description.english: Defeat all bosses
description.schinese: 击败所有首领

description.english: Complete Eco Land without losing any HP.
description.schinese: 不损失任何生命值通过行星生态保留地

description.english: Complete Solar Ruin without losing any HP
description.schinese: 不损失任何生命值通过索拉遗迹

description.english: Complete Polar Factory without losing any HP.
description.schinese: 不损失任何生命值通过极地工厂

description.english: Defeat The Doom Angel.
description.schinese: 击杀湮灭使徒

description.english: Defeat The Waste Disposer.
description.schinese: 击杀废品处理机

description.english: Complete Downfall Tower without losing any HP.
description.schinese: 无伤通过陨落高塔

description.english: Pick up more than 3 kinds of special Hearts of Life in a single game.
description.schinese: 一局游戏中，吃过三种以上的特殊的生命之心

description.english: Experience every curse room
description.schinese: 经历过所有的诅咒房间

description.english: Explore 100 rooms in the Downfall Tower.
description.schinese: 在陨落高塔探索100个房间

displayName.english: Is That The Power You Desire?

description.english: Eat Demon Heart and die
description.schinese: 吃恶魔之心死掉

description.english: Eliminate 5 monsters with one bomb
description.schinese: 一次性用炸弹炸死五个怪

description.english: Defeat any boss when HP is under 30%
description.schinese: 生命值低于30%下击败任意Boss

description.english: Get eliminated 100 times.
description.schinese: 死亡100次

description.english: Complete 20 challenge rooms.
description.schinese: 通过挑战房20次

description.english: Complete Fel Lab without losing any HP.
description.schinese: 不损失生命值通过邪能实验室

description.english: Acquire 200 items from crystals.
description.schinese: 在水晶中拾取超过200个物品

description.english: Take damage from Poison, Laser, Explosive, Frost and Electricity in a single round.
description.schinese: 一局游戏中被中毒，激光，炸弹，冰冻，电击攻击过

description.english: Have 3 orbitals active at the same time.
description.schinese: 拾取过超过三种以上的守护

description.english: Defeat The Clockwork Lich with Brooks.
description.schinese: 使用布鲁克斯击败发条巫妖

description.english: Defeat The Experiments Auditor.
description.schinese: 击败实验审核员

description.english: Defeat Mamasan
description.schinese: 击败妈妈桑

description.english: Get eliminated while having at least 200 Gold.
description.schinese: 携带200以上硬币死去

description.english: Explore 100 rooms on Fel Lab.
description.schinese: 在邪能实验室探索超过100个房间

description.english: Defeat the Cirrus Submarine.
description.schinese: 击败藤蔓潜艇.

description.english: Defeat Dr.Slump
description.schinese: 击败崩崩博士

description.english: Defeat The Mad Observer
description.schinese: 击败失控的观察者

description.english: Defeat any Boss with having any Cursed Chip.
description.schinese: 携带诅咒芯片击败任意一个首领

displayName.english: Till the End of the World

description.english: Level up every Annie's talent.
description.schinese: 升级安妮（海盗）的所有天赋

description.english: Unlock everything on Metapedia
description.schinese: 解锁元能百科里的所有项目（怪物，芯片，武器，道具）
